attributes.additional_details: Not only does Mr. Theroux present these ground-breaking episodes, he also writes and researches them. Notably, Louis has written and created an entire film 'My Scientology Movie'. His style of presentation is both entertaining and sincere. This man is at least as good at his work as Sir David Attenborough. Let's knight him!
attributes.background: For at least a decade now, Louis Theroux has been Great Britain's number one in documentary presenting. He has done wonders to educate and inform the British public, and he deserves a reward.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
